description: Manage service-side device registrations for an enrollment group in an Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service.

commands.name: az iot dps enrollment-group registration delete
commands.summary: Delete a device registration for an enrollment group in an Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service.
commands.syntax:
az iot dps enrollment-group registration delete --registration-id
                                                [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                                [--dps-name]
                                                [--etag]
                                                [--login]
                                                [--resource-group]

commands.name: az iot dps enrollment-group registration list
commands.summary: List device registrations for an enrollment group in an Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service.
commands.syntax:
az iot dps enrollment-group registration list --eid
                                              [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                              [--dps-name]
                                              [--login]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--top]

commands.name: az iot dps enrollment-group registration show
commands.summary: Get a device registration for an enrollment group in an Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service.
commands.syntax:
az iot dps enrollment-group registration show --registration-id
                                              [--auth-type {key, login}]
                                              [--dps-name]
                                              [--login]
                                              [--resource-group]
